# CMS #

## Definition ##
Gestion de Contenus
  - dynamique
  - blog
  - simplicité


## Tableau comparatif ##

  -  wordpress
  -  Ez.publish
  -  joomla
  -  Drupal
  -  TYPO3
  -  Spip
  -  Prestashop
  -  Magento
  -  Plone
  -  Django
  - Sharepoint
  -  Synfony
  -  cake  php
  -  zwed
  
  
|logiciel   | open source | langage  | Fonctionalité |
|-----------|-------------|----------|---------------|
|wordpress|oui|php|moteur de blog|
|Ez.publish|oui|php|CMS|
|joomla|oui|php|CMS|
|Drupal|oui|php|
|Typo3|oui|php|CMS|
|Spip|oui|php|CMS|
|Prestashop|oui|php|CMS|
|Magento|oui|php|e-commerce|
|Plone|oui|python|e-commerce|
|Django|oui|ruby|e-commerce|
|Sharepoint|non|doctype||
